item.title: Arberia Features
item.description:
Intro

  • We’ll be using toml format for all examples down below, I recommend using toml as it is easier to read.

  • You can find any YML to TOML converters if necessary.

Tabla de ejemplo

Nombre Edad Ciudad
Juan 25 Jipijapa
Palli 30 Jipijapa
Trevor 28 Cuenca

Assets (js/css)

The following is enabled by default

  • minification - makes the assets size smallest as possible.
  • bundling - bundles all the styles in one single asset
  • fingerprint/intergity check.

Search Page

PaperMod uses flexsearch.js for search functionality
